column5: thanks for the heads up wayne... will get on that video to find shoals lol..hey wayne you think you could fly a little lower and a little slower next time..thanks

I just heard the same thing regarding ice conditions....some areas are wide open and others have 3 - 4" of ice...the winds have a lot to do with the open water...  Rob....I can probably arrange to rent a cabin on Diamond next winter with huts included...would you be interested??
Based on recent reports and last years "success" I would say that you need to make a new sign, that will allow you to insert anyone's name, BUT Lloyd! Wayne will fit in there as well! LMAO HH
hey steve give me the details...sounds intresting..although i would like to fish on temagami a few days as well..
8 inches of ice from town to my place.. and my neighbour even has our parking plowed at the dock (so that the ice can get thicker not being insulated by snow)!
looking good   and I AM TERRY
oh wait   those signs are used  when we are not there
What... you thought I was inviting you back ! LMAO !  Lloyd.. Lloyd.. you packed yet??? lol
I know where Lloyd is this week  I think he's still there
I have a "warm fuzzy" feeling I know where he's been this week as well...

Lloyd won't be back til Sat. We are hoping to get out on Sunday. I'm going out Thursday to check the ice out and hope on Sunday to have the sleds up and running to tow the huts out.  I'm getting all warm and fuzzy inside now! (Must be the rum).....
He was online earlier today...edumacation must have been over for the day!  Was thinking of a trip to that lake myself...
yeah I was talking to Lloyd about that lake the other day myself.  but was thinking of walking not sleding..LOL
Guess I'd better get the hyfax runners onto my hut and the flip tube hardware all changed over to aircraft bolts/nuts. Sounds like it's almost go time..

I will let you guys know on Christmas day after the kids and inlaws are gone how we made out. Confident to say there will be at least 5 inches of ice. They didn't get a whole lot of snow.  Cheers, Ron...
Looking good Hun.  Now make sure if you invite us up this season that it's the absolute coldest day of the year!!! Wouldn't want to break a tradition
Just make sure Paul has new batteries in the truck !!  Not sure how many trips we'll get in this year. I've got a LOT of work in the shop this winter.... to get done before the first of May.
ok girls just stop it !
MMMM....ice on Temagami...one of my favourite things to hear!!
Hey, what's so bad about being Joe? It seems to me to be somewhat of a select group who can have a sign made just from them! lmao! HH
I was wondering where you get the upto date photo's ?  Very usefull info...

Did i hear.... ICE, READY, TEMAGAMI...   i got tears in my eyes...i had to wait all summer for this..at last she is frozen.. then again summer was awsome on temagami and so was spring..BUT ICE ROCKS..thanks for the updates wayne..
Actually it's not frozen Rob... still three open spots.. South of Cattle Island.. all around Rabbit Nose and Garden Islands..right up to almost Deer Island. Not good !
Hey Rob....when are you heading up???......I'll be up there with a few lads from Feb 26th - Mar 2nd...gotta get back on the 2nd due to it being the wife's B'day
Still dangerous guys..
hey steve i have not set the date yet but usually im there in the begining of march ..we wait for the laker season to open on temagami.. will let you know if im there same time as you..

wayne any new reports on hard water?? that last post i read from you was kinda crappy.. i guess all the snow slowing down the freeze..well hope to try some new lakes this year and maybe drop off another aluminum boat for spring.. have you ever ice fished diamond?? i will be up there this year for sure, its a long day of travel comming from where im staying (bear island) but im told very worth it..thanks for the updates wayne

Look up Rob... that's the picture from Saturday !! It's not snow.. just wind and water movement. There is very little snow up there.. sled trails aren't even open.  Have never fished Diamond.. but check my Diamond overflight video.. pause it and look for shoals! lol
